jobDescription: Delta Risk is looking for a full time Security Data Scientist to add to our team. This position is responsible for using state of the art machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies to identify security threats to an organizations’ IT infrastructure. The ideal candidate has a deep background in mathematics and statistical modeling is familiar with various tools to surface data insights. The candidate will work closely with the software development and operations teams to gain new insights across large data sets and refine existing model over time.
